name: Heirloom Necklace
description: Our antiqued sterling silver heirloom necklace is sure to become a cherished keepsake! Available with either a circle or square pendant, you have the freedom to choose which shape best compliments your photo. The fixed pendant hangs on a beautifully crafted 18‚Äù sterling silver rollo chain with a vintage toggle front closure. Each pendant is adorned with your choice of either one or two mini sterling silver initial charms. Please email your high resolution jpg photo and initial choices to info@belladorn.net Square pendant measures 30mm Round pendant measures 27mm

name: Heirloom Bracelet
description: This sterling silver bracelet gets a touch of vintage charm with your image beautifully set in your choice of a circle or square pendant. Each one is adorned with a freshwater pearl and a delicate silver bead. Your image can be made in color, black & white or sepia. Please email your high resolution jpg photo to info@belladorn.net after you place your order. Square pendant measures 30mm Round pendant measures 27mm

name: Bezel Photo Ring
description: Ring around your finger, a photo shows your love! This antique silver-plated brass ring with your choice of bezel shape keeps your loved ones close at hand. The wide, modern band adjusts to fit almost any size finger. Your ring's image can be made in your choice of color, black & white or sepia. Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. Please email your high resolution jpg photo and initial choices to info@belladorn.net after you place your order.

name: Wine Stopper
description: Your wine stopper's image can be made in your choice of color, black & white or sepia. Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. Email your digital image to jody@belladorn.net after you place your order.

name: Keychains & Accessories
description: Choose your accessory from the from drop-down menu below. Your accessory's image can be made in your choice of color, black & white or sepia. Please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. Please email your high resolution jpg photo info@belladorn.net (Click image at left to enlarge)
